title: Riot's fixing things.
body:
Can someone help me fix black screen after loading in to game ?
I hear sounds but my screen is black.

I wonder when will Riot hire some good programmers to fix issues such as bugsplat, black screen, crashing the game, reconnect not working.
Shitty developers, shitty game.

I just got a leaver buster for joining in to 2 games with black screen andd I can't get loot now.

Riot is soo smart, make ANY leaver pay so much for few left games so he won't return to league again instead of ACTUALLY fixing those disconnect / black screen / bugsplat shit bugs. Cheap developers.

replies.body:
Hey, we can help here!  All of these issues that you're explaining happen for different reasons.  The black screen is most commonly an indication of your network struggling to reach the game server, so it can't download any assets.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help fix that up.

If you're also having bug splats, let me know, as it sounds you have quite a combination of different issues.  I can definitely see that being frustrating!

I downloaded adwcleaner and when scanning 7 problems/viruses appeared, so I cleanned them and sure some sites  load faster and LoL runs a bit faster too :D

But that didn't fix my issue. For example yesterday, I played 2 ranked flex with my 2 friends just fine. When one of my friend went sleeping, we hit the solo/duo Q and suddenly after the loading started working it just did that again... Black screen with only my cursor visible and after the loading was done I could hear sounds from the game...

I have no idea what's going on and my brain just don't get it.

Once rebooting PC fixed this for a while
Upgrading graphic drivers fixed this for a while
ALT + ENTER fix this just for window screen

But nothing can fix it for good. I am really desperate right now since I have low priority Q on 2 accounts already because of this.

Hey there, sorry to hear this issue is still happening for you.  :(  I know you've tried a lot of steps, so let our tech team help you out directly.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to collect some logs and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for context.  We'll see you there!

I solved the problem, problem was somehow with new Nvidia drivers that started doing it in other games (black screen / flcikering).
I simply downgraded drivers to older version and it works perfectly fine. My bad for pointing at Riot, sorry.
